Our Wedding

Greetings, early winter weather. We hope that everyone is staying healthy and staying safe.

We have decided to register and get married on March 21, 2024. Therefore, I would like to ask for the continued support of all of my close friends.

I would like to have a small party full of hearts. I am very sorry for the inconvenience, but I would love to have your attendance.
